description: Billy Ray Cyrus has urged fans not to 'jump the gun' after he seemingly inadvertently set off rumors she'd secretly tied the knot with her fiancé Liam Hemsworth.
title: Billy Ray Cyrus quells Miley secret wedding rumours
title_page: Billy Ray Cyrus quells Miley secret wedding rumours | Daily Mail Online
text:
Billy Ray Cyrus has urged fans not to 'jump the gun,' after he seemingly inadvertently set off rumours she'd secretly tied the knot with her fiancé Liam Hemsworth.
The country singer, 55, had taken to social media on Thursday night, posting a screenshot of a digital camera with an image of beaming Miley, 24, on the screen.
He'd captioned the image: 'I'm so happy...you are happy @mileycyrus'. But it was Miley's attire which really got her fans talking since the singer and actress was clad in a floaty white dress, true to her bohemian and eclectic aesthetic.
Scroll down for video
'I'm so happy': Country singer Billy Ray Cyrus has sparked speculation his daughter Miley Cyrus may have secretly tied the knot with her fiancé Liam Hemsworth thanks to a cryptic Instagram post ...but on Saturday reposted the same image with a caption exhorting fans not to 'jump the gun'
The singer appears to have taken the image herself, her blonde hair evident in the reflection on the lens.
The comments section naturally blew up on Billy Ray's post, with fans querying whether she was sporting a wedding dress.
'Wedding??', one excited follower'd asked, with others chiming in, 'Congratulations!' and 'Omg is that a wedding dress?' Another had lamented: 'I'm so mad. You can't just start all the drama and leave us hanging.'
MailOnline has contacted both Miley and Liam's representatives for comment.
Secret nuptials? The comments section naturally blew up on Billy Ray's post, with fans querying whether she was sporting a wedding dress
However, by Saturday, the Achy Breaky Heart singer had uploaded the same image of Miley with the caption: 'Whoa! Don't jump the gun. Been at work #StillTheKing Glad to see so many love @MileyCyrus the same as I do #happy'.
The hashtag refers to a CMT sitcom that stars Billy Ray, ran its first season from June to August last year, and during that time was picked up for a second season.
The lovebirds were recently alleged to be planning a summer wedding in the Himalayan mountains.
An insider recently told Life & Style: 'Miley has a real hippie side and wants to embrace that rather than spending millions'.
'She wants to focus on the spiritual side of marriage and is very interested in Hinduism, so she is looking at locations in Nepal, where Hinduism is a way of life,' the source continued.
Proud papa: Billy Ray, pictured with Miley at the Inspiration Gala in June 2015, captioned the image: 'I'm so happy...you are happy @mileycyrus'
The wedding will reportedly span over several days, with activities such as meditation and yoga being incorporated into the ceremony.
Another insider told the publication that the couple are also planning to move Down Under permanently following their nuptials.
'[Miley's] telling close friends she'll move to Australia next year.'
'She loves the laid-back lifestyle there. She feels right at home' the source added.
The pair first met in 2009 on the set of their movie The Last Song. They became engaged in 2012 only to break it off a year later, before reconciling in 2016.
'At the time we were going in different directions and it's just what needed to happen. We were both super young and it was a good decision at the time — we both needed that,' Liam revealed to GQ Australia last May.
